paper_abstract: User profiles play an important role in information retrieval system. In this paper, we propose a novel method for the acquisition of ontology-based user profiles. In the method, the ontology-based user profiles can maintain the representations of personal interest. In addition, user ontologies can be automatically constructed. The method can make user profiles strong expressive and less manually interfered. (C) 2013 Elsevier Ltd. All rights reserved.
paper_title: A method for the acquisition of ontology-based user profiles
